oldswing.title: Old Swing
oldswing.cmd.paths.category: Swing speeds for %s has a swing speed of %s.
oldswing.cmd.paths.remaining: ...remaining items can be found in the config menu or config file.
oldswing.cmd.paths.no_custom: There are no items with custom swing speeds.
oldswing.cmd.swings.no_custom: you have no custom swing speeds
oldswing.cmd.swings.out_of_range: Swing speed is out of range [Range: %d ~ %d]
oldswing.cmd.swings.holding: You must be holding something to set a custom speed.
oldswing.cmd.swings.nonexistent: Item ["%s"] does not exist in the Forge item registry.
oldswing.cmd.swings.custom_remove: Removed %s from the custom swing list.
oldswing.cmd.swings.custom_nonexistent: %s does not exist in custom swing list.
oldswing.cmd.not_player: Calling source is not a player.
oldswing.cmd.mod_enabled_candy: The mod must be enabled to change eye candy states.
oldswing.cmd.mod_enabled_animation: The mod must be enabled to change animation states.
oldswing.cmd.mod_enabled_paths: The mod must be enabled to see config values.
oldswing.cmd.mod_enabled_swings: The mod must be enabled to change swing speeds.
oldswing.cmd.cooldown.on: The cooldown animation that plays after a swing or change in slot will now be prevented. This will not modify combat.
oldswing.cmd.cooldown.off: A cooldown animation will now play after every swing or change in slot. This will not modify combat.
oldswing.cmd.reequip.on: Reequip animation will no longer play when an item's durability changes.
oldswing.cmd.reequip.off: Reequip animation will now play when an item's durability changes.
oldswing.cmd.sway.on: The subtle arm sway animation that happens when you look around will now be prevented.
oldswing.cmd.sway.off: You will now see a subtle arm sway animation occur as you look around.
oldswing.cmd.sweep.on: Sweep particles will no longer appear when attacking entities.
oldswing.cmd.sweep.off: Sweep particles will now appear when attacking entities.
oldswing.cmd.bobbing.off: You will now see a subtle vertical bobbing effect when jumping or falling.
oldswing.cmd.bobbing.on: You will no longer see a subtle vertical bobbing effect when jumping or falling.
oldswing.cmd.sneaking.on: The sneaking animation will no longer be smooth.
oldswing.cmd.sneaking.off: The sneaking animation will now be smooth.
oldswing.cmd.disintegrate.on: The tool disintegration animation and breaking sound is now disabled.
oldswing.cmd.disintegrate.off: The tool disintegration animation and breaking sound is now enabled.
oldswing.cmd.drop.on: The swinging animation that occurs when dropping items on the ground will no longer occur.
oldswing.cmd.drop.off: The swinging animation that occurs when dropping items on the ground will now occur.
oldswing.cmd.oldDamage.on: The old durability bar colors are now visible.
oldswing.cmd.oldDamage.off: The modern durability bar colors are now visible.
oldswing.cmd.oldHolding.on: The old item holding and swinging rotations are now active.
oldswing.cmd.oldHolding.off: The modern item holding and swinging rotations are now active.
oldswing.cmd.oldFloating.on: The old floating 2D items will now be simulated (WIP).
oldswing.cmd.oldFloating.off: The modern floating 3D items are now active.
oldswing.cmd.oldFlicker.on: The flicker of light from light emitting sources are now disabled.
oldswing.cmd.oldFlicker.off: The flicker of light from light emitting sources are now enabled.
oldswing.cmd.oldTooltips.on: The old tooltip boxes will now be rendered.
oldswing.cmd.oldTooltips.off: The modern tooltip boxes will now be rendered.
oldswing.custom.out_of_range: %s will not receive a custom speed since the number was out of range (%d ~ %d)
oldswing.custom.not_number: %s will not receive a custom speed since the speed provided was not a number
oldswing.custom.not_registered: %s will not receive a custom speed since it was not found in the Forge item registry
oldswing.config.old_damage_colors_descri: Bring back the old durability bar colors for items in the hotbar.
oldswing.config.old_item_holding_descrip: Bring back the old item holding position and swinging rotations.
oldswing.config.old_2d_items_description: Bring back the old floating 2D item entities. (%sWIP%s)
oldswing.config.old_light_flicker_descri: Bring back the old lighting by disabling the flickering of light from light emitting sources.
%sIt is recommended to combine this feature with an old lighting resource pack.
oldswing.config.old_tooltips_description: Bring back the old tooltip boxes from Minecraft Beta 1.7.
oldswing.config.cooldown_description: An animation that plays after a swing or change in slot.
oldswing.config.reequip_description: An animation that plays when an item's durability changes.
oldswing.config.arm_sway_description: A subtle animation that is applied to the arm when you look around.
oldswing.config.sweep_particles_descript: A particle animation that appears after attacking an entity with a sword.
oldswing.config.bob_vertical_description: A subtle animation that is applied to the arm and viewing distance when jumping or falling.
oldswing.config.smooth_sneak_description: A subtle animation that is applied when sneaking up and down.
oldswing.config.tool_disintegration_desc: A disintegration animation and breaking sound that happens when a tool runs out of durability.
oldswing.config.drop_description: A swinging animation that occurs when dropping an item on the ground.
oldswing.config.item_swing_description: The swing speed of items that are not blocks, swords, or tools.
oldswing.config.block_swing_description: The swing speed when placing blocks.
oldswing.config.tool_swing_description: The swing speed for tools such as shovels and pickaxes.
oldswing.config.fatigue_description_1: This will override every swing speed when the mining fatigue potion effect is active.
oldswing.config.haste_description_1: This will override every swing speed when the haste potion effect is active.
oldswing.config.global_swing_description: This will override every swing speed regardless of configured values.
If you are %sphotosensitive%s, it is recommended to set this speed to %s0%s.
oldswing.config.custom_removal: Delete %s from the customized speed list.
oldswing.config.auto_add_item: Add the item in your character's hand.
oldswing.config.add_item: Add the item typed in the input box.
oldswing.config.clear_custom_list: This will delete all items within the list.
oldswing.config.clear_custom_list_note: Click on the %sReset%s checkbox to active this button.
oldswing.chat.open_config: You can open the config using the %s key.
